availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel W. Long (Scott County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mollie L. Beatty Long in Scott County on October 6, 1863. Graduated from the Law Department of the University of Louisville in Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1858. Attorney in Scott County in 1860. Captain in the Kentucky State Guard in 1863. Presiding judge in Georgetown in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 9.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Scott County, Newtown, p. 44.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Scott County Marriages, Film 000183225.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Scott County, KY, July 1863, p. 17.
Catalogue of the Officers and Students in the Law Department of the University of Louisville: Session of 1859-'60 (Louisville, KY: Hull & Brother, 1860), p. 15.
KYR-0001-004-1361.
